page.title: 08Stoke-by-Clare pond
page.content: The village pond was thoroughly cleaned out during the summer by a team of Haverhill youths working under the direction of the Youth Training Opportunities scheme. They created a small island in the middle and shaped the bed so that this island might always be surrounded by water. It will be necessary to wait until winter to check the water level before work can be completed.Hopefully this will become an attractive feature of the village. The village was placed 2nd in the "Best Kept Village"competition organised by Suffolk Community Council.
